Key Arguments: The legislation represents government overreach concerning freedom of speech and expression.
Citizens should have the right to discern misinformation and disinformation themselves.
The bill could lead to bureaucratic control over freedom of expression.
The legislation poses a threat to democracy and society.
There is no need for additional laws or powers for the ACMA.
Notable Quotes: We shall have the right to hold opinions without interference.
This bill is a threat to our democracy, and our society as a whole.
